arguments.argument:
image_speed = 0.2 select = 1 str[1] = 'Data1' str[2] = 'Data2' str[3] = 'Data3' bossicon[1] = sprBossIcon1 bossicon[2] = sprBossIcon2 bossicon[3] = sprBossIcon3 difText[0] = 'Medium' difText[1] = 'Hard' difText[2] = 'Very Hard' difText[3] = 'Impossible' //load boss&item icon information loadIcons()
for (i = 1; i <= 3; i += 1) { time[i] = menu_time[i] div 100 hour[i] = time[i] div 3600 atime[i] = time[i] mod 3600 muni[i] = atime[i] div 60 sec[i] = atime[i] mod 60 }
